thought.author: Jessica Gaston
description: Here at Jugendstil_IO, we're strong advocates of test-driven development and continuous delivery. Not only will an appropriate software testing strategy improve the quality of your product, enhance overall customer satisfaction and save you hard dollars, but it is at the same time one of the fundamental building blocks for your DevOps journey.
thought.quote: One man's crappy software is another man's full time job.

thought.author: Paul Graham
description: Sometimes when we start working on a new service or product, we fall in love with the idea and jump straight into developing a solution.

Today's issue of #ThoughtsOnProgramming features "Y Combinator's co-founder Paul Graham with a piece of advice from his essay ""Great Hackers" that we should spend more time choosing the right problem to solve before jumping into implementation.
thought.quote: In programming, as in many fields, the hard part isn't solving problems, but deciding what problems to solve.

thought.author: Cory House
description: Code for humans, not machines! We just can't overemphasis enough the importance of writing clean, comprehensive and maintainable code. Today's #ThoughtsOnProgramming features Cory House with a superb analogy on why your code should tell a story and be self-explanatory.
thought.quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, itâ€™s bad.
